Hero.description: Transform your fragmented business into a cohesive brand with a clear identity, structured approach, and data-driven growth strategy.

footer.description: Transforming businesses into legendary brands with strategic positioning and professional innovation.

About.subtitle: Check if our brand assessment is suitable for your current business situation

suitable.title: Suitable If
items: You have an active business with sales, services, and customers
You create content or do marketing but results are fragmented
You have a logo and website but brand identity isn't clear
Customers ask 'What makes you different?' and you lack clear answer
Your decisions are more emotional than structural

notSuitable.title: Not Suitable If
items: It's just an idea, not a business yet
You're looking for rapid growth with promises and deceptions
All you want is logo design or unplanned content production

result.title: Your Suitability Score
result.description: This assessment may not be suitable for your current situation.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: Comprehensive strategic brand solutions designed to elevate your business to a global level.

branding.title: Brand Identity Design
branding.desc: Complete visual identity systems including logo design, colors, and typography that ensure consistency.

strategy.title: Brand Strategy
strategy.desc: Deep market research and strategic positioning to differentiate your brand and create leadership.

consultancy.title: Brand Consultancy
consultancy.desc: Expert guidance on brand growth and expansion to help you in every step of your development.

digital.title: Digital Branding
digital.desc: Comprehensive digital presence including website design and social media strategies.

experience.title: Brand Experience
experience.desc: Creating memorable experiences through storytelling and customer engagement strategies.

refresh.title: Brand Refresh
refresh.desc: Full brand transformation services for businesses ready for major evolution.

Evaluating.title: What Exactly Are We
Evaluating.subtitle: This assessment covers 4 key areas parallel to our service offerings

categories.title: Brand Establishment
categories.desc: Evaluating your brand message clarity, differentiation, and visual identity
questions: Is your current business message clear or not?
Does your business have limits or does it look like everyone else?
Does your business have a visual identity or fragmented designs?

categories.title: Centralized Digital Infrastructure
categories.desc: Assessing your customer journey, decision centers, and unified approach
questions: Where is your audience coming from and where do they need to get to?
Do you have a decision center (website/service page/specific route)?
Do your pages and channels have a unified approach?

categories.title: Content and Campaign Engines
categories.desc: Reviewing content consistency, campaign purpose, and decision-based structure
questions: Does your content have a consistent message?
Are your campaigns purposeful or emotional?
Is your content structure based on 'decision making' or interaction?

categories.title: Monitoring and Support
categories.desc: Assessing data-driven decisions, quality control, and managed growth path
questions: Are decisions based on data and assessment or on suspicion?
Is there something for quality control of message and design?
Managed growth path or a new path every month?

Assessment.title: What Are the Outcomes of This Assessment?
Assessment.subtitle: After completing the assessment, you'll receive comprehensive insights and actionable recommendations

outcomes.title: Detailed Problem Analysis
outcomes.description: Deep understanding of your main business challenges, not just a generic list but specific insights tailored to your situation.

outcomes.title: Business to Brand Roadmap
outcomes.description: Step-by-step transformation roadmap with clear milestones, timelines, and actionable strategies for your brand journey.

outcomes.title: Service Recommendations
outcomes.description: Expert recommendations on which type of service to start with based on your specific assessment results and priorities.

outcomes.title: Cost Optimization
outcomes.description: Clear identification of what items are not needed now, helping you prevent erroneous costs and focus on what matters most.

AfterEvaluation.title: Pathway After Evaluation
AfterEvaluation.subtitle: Based on your assessment results, one of these three approaches will be recommended

pathways.title: Brand Establishment
pathways.subtitle: Start with brand foundation
pathways.recommendedWhen: Message and identity are not clear

pathways.title: Central Digital Infrastructure
pathways.subtitle: Build decision pathways
pathways.recommendedWhen: Brand is clear but no decision path exists

pathways.title: Content & Campaign Engines
pathways.subtitle: Optimize execution
pathways.recommendedWhen: Brand and infrastructure exist but execution is fragmented

AssessmentForm.title: Request Your Brand
AssessmentForm.subtitle: Fill out the form below to receive your personalized brand assessment and roadmap

labels.goal: What is your primary goal in being a brand? (Optional)
labels.hasMarketing: Have you ever spent on marketing your business? *

placeholders.problem: Describe your biggest challenge in one sentence...
placeholders.goal: What do you want to achieve with your brand?

AssessmentForm.footerNote: We'll contact you within 24 hours with your personalized assessment results
AssessmentForm.bottomDesc: Being a brand means getting a business out of fragmentation. His image is determined. His message becomes clear. His decision path is created.

ServicePage.mainSubtitle: Turning a Business into a Brand, Step by Step
ServicePage.topNote: We don't sell individual services. We build a complete system — from identity and messaging to execution and monitoring.
ServicePage.whyTitle: Why do most businesses, despite their efforts, fail to become brands?
ServicePage.whyBox: Because usually only one part is done: design, content, or advertising. But a brand is not built with a single action. A brand is a system. Hataw Group designs this system in an integrated and executable way.
ServicePage.stagesTitle: The 4 Core Service Stages of Hataw Group
ServicePage.importantRule: Important Rule: Every business enters this path from a different point. The correct starting stage is defined after the Brand Review.
ServicePage.differenceTitle: What is the difference with Hataw Group?
ServicePage.diffSubtitle: Clear differentiation, no slogans — just results.
ServicePage.costTitle: How is the service cost determined?
ServicePage.costNote: Pricing is not fixed because businesses do not start from the same point.
ServicePage.collabSubtitle: All collaborations start from one point: Business-to-Brand Review
collabItems: What is not needed right now
ServicePage.footerNote: If you have an active business and want to move beyond scattered execution, these services are designed specifically to turn a business into a brand.
